LogMessage.Message: To Craft Crested Gear: 1) Meld 3 Guile XII on your gathering gear, and 3 Cunning XII on your crafter gear. 2) Purchase mats: 48x Neo Abrasive, 82x Hydrophobic Preservative, 140x Shaaloani Coke, 62x Diatryma Pelt, 56x Cronopio Skin. 3) Run Lv101.xml

UserDialog.DialogText: To Craft Crested Gear: 1) Meld 3 Guile XII on your gathering gear, and 3 Cunning XII on your crafter gear. 2) Purchase mats: 48x Neo Abrasive, 82x Hydrophobic Preservative, 140x Shaaloani Coke, 62x Diatryma Pelt, 56x Cronopio Skin. 3) Run Lv101.xml

CodeChunks.CodeChunk: Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Please see #doh-dol-issues channel for update on Endwalker.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(5000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(5000);
